name: tmuxy
description: A tmux terminal wrapper - available as Tauri app or web server

scripts.devcontainer: docker compose -f .devcontainer/compose.yml up -d && docker compose -f .devcontainer/compose.yml exec tmuxy-dev bash
scripts.yolo-mode: docker compose -f .devcontainer/compose.yml up -d && docker compose -f .devcontainer/compose.yml exec tmuxy-dev bash -c 'npm start && claude --dangerously-skip-permissions'
scripts.start: pm2 delete tmuxy-dev 2>/dev/null; pm2 start ./scripts/dev.sh --name tmuxy-dev --cwd /workspace
